resources.string: Would you like to take a part in study?
Do you agree with terms of use?
Would you like end this study?
Please, put some reason, why you choose this answer
No internet connection. Please, enable wifi/data and click \"Try again\".
Thank you and hope we see you next time!
We are a little sad, but also next day is there a opportunity to change your favorite application by participating in study!

**When UXMobile is integrated as a service we collect the following information:** 1. Consistent random pseudo ID for every end user 2. After reading the task, you will be redirected to a website. 3. Geographic location (Country only). 4. Screens visited by the end user in an app using UXMobile only. 5. Interaction patterns by the end user on your app (screen actions, gestures: taps, scrolls) 6. Information provided by the customer (except information customer chooses to block from being sent to UXMobile) We strictly adhere to a **non-recording policy of any PII** (Personally Identifiable Information) and contractually prohibits recording of sensitive information including ePHI, PCI or PII information. We provide API methods to hide PII and sensitive information. **We require you, as a customer, to hide PII information and only process anonymized data and to mention the usage of UXCam on your privacy policy.** As such the data UXMobile processes on behalf of its customers are anonymous.
